replies.bodyText:
The FHIR registry includes these two capability statements:
/fhir-registry/src/main/resources/hl7/fhir/core/package/CapabilityStatement-base.json
/fhir-registry/src/main/resources/hl7/fhir/core/package/CapabilityStatement-base2.json
Since they seemed related to the base FHIR spec and have experimental = true, I wasn't sure they should be included in "instantiates".
replies.author: tbieste

replies.bodyText:
interesting.  i agree we should exclude them.  i wonder whether they should truly be in the registry at all.
@JohnTimm thoughts?
replies.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: if we don't here from john by the morning, I think we should just add a comment (either here or where I just suggested it below) and merge this one in time for 4.4.1
replies.author: lmsurpre
